ygData.subject: Re: looking cool. *some spoilers*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You get the shiny orb of the Froglok Scyer.  Froglok Scyer can charm so be careful. It is in the room with the two pillars of water near the heart spiders.
ygData.messageBody:
> Yeah, I finally got some info on the Orb. It's supposingly found in Guk
> somewhere. My friend told me the name although I've forgotten
> already...I'll let you guys know when I ask again. Says it's a real rare
> spawn.

You get the shiny orb of the Froglok Scyer. Froglok Scyer can charm so be
careful.
It is in the room with the two pillars of water near the heart spiders. The
orb is a rare drop of a rare spawn so if you want to get one be prepared
to go and camp there for a few days.

Gene
